definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc

sentences.english: 'I wanted to see everything, ' See said.
sentences.chinese: 邝丽莎说，我想看到所有的东西。

sentences.english: He is now a Chairman of Hong Kong Institution of Engineers, Building Division.
sentences.chinese: 邝先生现为香港工程师学会建造分部主席。

sentences.english: Mr Kwong, Samson killed six, hemp firmly missing.
sentences.chinese: 邝先生被害，孙六被杀，麻稳稳失踪。

sentences.english: Clearly Kwong's example failed to inspire self-introspection within the KMT.
sentences.chinese: 邝的例子，显然也没给国民党太多启示。

sentences.english: Yes, It was the scene that Kuang kissed Wong in final phase of film.
sentences.chinese: 就是邝裕民最后亲吻王佳芝那场。

sentences.english: Wang plays Kuang Yumin, a student leader in the conspiracy.
sentences.chinese: 王力宏饰演卷入此项阴谋之中的爱国学生领袖邝裕民。

sentences.english: Was really a good boy in his childhood, in my memory.
sentences.chinese: 邝建昌真正地是一个好男孩在他的童年，在我的记忆。

definition: to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
Li ethnic group of Hainan Province/surname Li/abbr. for Lebanon 黎巴嫩[Li2 ba1 nen4]
surname Yin/dynasty name at the end the Shang dynasty, after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
